titleStmt.title: A pleasant comedy entituled: An humerous dayes myrth As it hath beene sundrie times publikely acted by the right honourable the Earle of Nottingham Lord high Admirall his seruants. By. G.C.
Humorous day's mirth
titleStmt.author: Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: An humerous dayes mirth.
Quire H is in two settings; H1v catchword reads (1) "Mor." or (2) "norable".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
